channel.title: Add special bar to weapon
channel.description: I want to add d claw spec to chaotic claws but theres no spec bar for them.

item.title: Add special bar to weapon
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“winK, post:3, topic:540401”]I tried adding the chaotic claws with the d claws. I think it has the spec now, the problem is the spec bar isn’t showing up… So maybe the item definitions are missing or something? Because it’s also a 1 handed weapon when it should be 2. And there’s no where I can find where you declare a weapon is 2handed I don’t think. Maybe there’s something I can search but ‘2handed’ or ‘2 handed’ comes up with nothing.[/quote]Check wherever the special attack bar frame is being sent then add a case for chaotic claws.

Read full topic

item.title: Add special bar to weapon
item.dc:creator: @winK winK
item.description:
@winK wrote:

I tried adding the chaotic claws with the d claws. I think it has the spec now, the problem is the spec bar isn’t showing up… So maybe the item definitions are missing or something? Because it’s also a 1 handed weapon when it should be 2. And there’s no where I can find where you declare a weapon is 2handed I don’t think. Maybe there’s something I can search but ‘2handed’ or ‘2 handed’ comes up with nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Add special bar to weapon
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Search for the dragon claw id in your server, as soon as you see something handling its special attack throw in your claw id, e.g.

if (itemId == DRAGON_CLAW || itemId == CHAOTIC_CLAW) { setSpecialAttack(SpecialAttack.DRAGON_CLAW); // ... }

Read full topic
